Welcome to Harbor Health â€” Where Every Patient Matters

At Harbor Health, we believe pharmacy care should be personal, not transactional. As a family-owned neighborhood pharmacy serving Corpus Christi and the surrounding communities, we've built our reputation on one simple promise: treating every patient like family.

Unlike chain pharmacies where you're just another number in line, we know your name, remember your preferences, and take the time to answer your questions. Our licensed pharmacists are available around the clock to provide expert guidance on medications, health concerns, and wellness strategies.

Comprehensive Pharmacy Services Designed Around You

We've expanded beyond traditional pharmacy services to meet the evolving healthcare needs of our community. Here's what sets us apart:

Lightning-Fast Prescription Refills

  • Online refill system available 24/7
  • Auto-refill enrollment for chronic medications
  • Most prescriptions ready within 15 minutes
  • Text alerts when your medication is ready

Free Local Delivery Service

  • Same-day delivery throughout Corpus Christi
  • No minimum order required
  • Contactless delivery options available
  • Scheduled delivery windows to fit your day

Seamless Prescription Transfers

  • We handle everything with your previous pharmacy
  • Transfer multiple prescriptions at once
  • Simple online transfer form
  • No waiting â€” most transfers complete within hours

Immunizations & Wellness Services

  • Flu shots, COVID-19 vaccines, and travel immunizations
  • Walk-ins welcome, appointments available
  • Most insurance plans accepted
  • Licensed pharmacists administer all vaccinations

Experience the Harbor Health Difference

Tired of long wait times, impersonal service, and confusing insurance issues at big-chain pharmacies? Making the switch to our pharmacy in Corpus Christi is easier than you think. Our dedicated team will handle your prescription transfers, work directly with your doctor's office, and ensure your medications are ready when you need them.

Getting started takes less than 5 minutes. Simply fill out our online transfer form, and we'll take care of the rest. You'll immediately notice the difference when you walk into a pharmacy where the staff greets you by name and genuinely cares about your health outcomes.

Transfer Your Prescriptions Set Up Auto-Refill

Important: 24/7 Pharmacist Access

Health concerns don't follow business hours. That's why our licensed pharmacists are available around the clock to answer your questions about medications, side effects, drug interactions, and general health advice. Whether it's 3 PM or 3 AM, we're here for you.

Call our 24/7 pharmacist line: (361) 555-0000 or use our chat feature below for immediate assistance.

Specialized Services for Complex Health Needs

Beyond everyday prescriptions, Harbor Health offers specialized pharmacy services that many chain stores simply can't provide:

Custom Compounding

Our state-certified compounding lab allows us to create customized medications tailored to your specific needs. Whether you need a different dosage strength, an alternative delivery form (like a topical cream instead of a pill), or a formulation without certain allergens, our compounding pharmacists can help.

Home Health & Medical Equipment

We stock a comprehensive selection of home health supplies including diabetic testing supplies, compression stockings, mobility aids, wound care products, and durable medical equipment. Our staff can help you select the right products and show you how to use them properly.

Medication Therapy Management

If you're taking multiple medications, our pharmacists can conduct a comprehensive medication review to identify potential interactions, reduce side effects, and optimize your therapy. This complimentary service has helped hundreds of patients improve their health outcomes and reduce unnecessary medications.

Deeply Rooted in the Corpus Christi Community

As a locally-owned business, we're invested in the health and prosperity of our neighbors. We're not just a pharmacy â€” we're an active community partner. We sponsor local youth sports teams, participate in health fairs, provide medication disposal programs, and offer free health screenings throughout the year.

When you choose Harbor Health, you're supporting a local family business that reinvests in our community. Every prescription filled here helps us continue our mission of accessible, compassionate healthcare for all Corpus Christi residents.
